StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_RemoveReferral]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ContractID int = 0 AS
DECLARE @ReferralID INT SET @ReferralID = (SELECT REFERRAL_ID FROM REFERRAL WHERE CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID)
IF EXISTS (SELECT REFERRAL_ID FROM RESERVE_REFERRAL WHERE REFERRAL_ID = @ReferralID) BEGIN DELETE FROM RESERVE_REFERRAL WHERE REFERRAL_ID = @ReferralID END
DELETE FROM REFERRAL WHERE CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID
